thread.title: Victorian wicketkeeper Sam Harper hit in head, taken to hospital - Yahoo7
thread.title_full: Victorian wicketkeeper Sam Harper hit in head, taken to hospital - Yahoo7

author: Aap On February
title: Victorian wicketkeeper Sam Harper hit in head, taken to hospital - Yahoo7
text:
Share Victorian wicketkeeper Sam Harper hit in head, taken to hospital - Yahoo7 Victorian wicketkeeper Sam Harper has been taken to hospital after being struck in the head by a bat in their Sheffield Shield match against South Australia at Adelaide Oval. Close Sam Harper hit in the head by bat UP NEXT VIDEO Sam Harper hit in the head by bat. Source: 7News Sam Harper hit in the head by bat 
South Australia's Jake Lehmann pulled a short ball from spinner Jon Holland and in his follow-through the bat hit Harper, who was wearing a helmet while standing up to the stumps. Lehmann collects Harper. Image: Cricket.com.au 
The 20-year-old keeper fell to the turf and appeared in some discomfort but was able to walk off the field with assistance from medical staff. Lehmann and Cameron White check on Harper. Image: Cricket.com.au 
He was taken to hospital for scans, which have not identified any bleeding or bone damage, but he will remain in hospital overnight for observation. Image: Cricket.com.au
